TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintQueueStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: 資料流，表示列印佇列中的多工緩衝處理列印工作。

span.span: A stream that represents a spooled print job in a print queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個類別來寫入多工緩衝處理檔案，不會自動包含的裝置特定資訊[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)]多工緩衝處理器。Use this class to write device specific information to a spool file that is not automatically included by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] spooler. 當然，您需要知道多工緩衝處理檔案是否[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_emf](~/includes/tlasharptla-emf-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]。Of course, you need to know whether the spool file is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_emf](~/includes/tlasharptla-emf-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]. 如果您偏好使用陣列，您也可以使用兩個多載方法和屬性來寫入多工緩衝處理檔案。If you prefer working with a array, you can also use two of the overloads of the method and the property to write to the spool file. > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援為 Windows 服務或 ASP.NET 應用程式或服務中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果您想要從 Windows Form 應用程式列印，請參閱命名空間。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 關閉資料流並釋出與此資料流相關聯的任何資源，例如通訊端和檔案控制代碼。

span.span: Closes the stream and releases any resources, such as sockets and file handles, that are associated with it.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool A_0);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool A_0) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (A_0 As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool A_0);

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法。This method is called by the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`未命名的布林參數設定為具有方法`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the unnamed Boolean parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`未命名的布林參數設定為與`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the unnamed Boolean parameter set to `false`. 當未命名的布林參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the unnamed Boolean parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫，請小心不要參考到所要的早期呼叫中先前處置的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that were previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須正好一次上呼叫每個從呼叫傳回。 must be called exactly once on every that is returned from a call to .

MemberSignature.Value: ~PrintQueueStream ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed
Finalize ()
!PrintQueueStream ()

summary.span: 可讓 嘗試釋放資源，並執行其他清除作業，不必等到記憶體回收利用 。

span.span: Enables a to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer) As Integer
public: override int Read(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 位元組陣列。

span.span: An array of bytes.

param.name: offset
param.span: 在緩衝區中以零為起始的位元組位移，您想要在此處開始儲存自資料流所讀取的資料。

span.span: The zero-based byte offset in the buffer where you want to begin storing the data that is read from the stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 自該資料流讀取的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to be read from the stream.

summary.span: 從該資料流讀取位元組序列，並依讀取的位元組數將資料流中的讀取/寫入位置往前移。

span.span: Reads a sequence of bytes from the stream and advances the read/write position in the stream by the number of bytes that were read.

returns.span: ，保留讀取到緩衝區的位元組總數。

span.span: An that holds the total number of bytes that are read into the buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果許多位元組目前沒有提供;，傳回值可以是小於所要求的位元組數目或可以是零 (0) 的讀取/寫入位置是否在資料流結尾。The return value can be less than the number of requested bytes if that many bytes are not currently available; or the number can be zero (0) if the read/write position is at the end of the stream. 此方法傳回時，`buffer`包含指定的位元組陣列及其值之間`offset`和 （位移 + 計數-1） 從來源讀取的位元組所取代。When this method returns, `buffer` contains the specified byte array and the values between `offset` and (offset + count - 1) are replaced by the bytes that are read from the source.

public: override long Seek(long offset, System::IO::SeekOrigin origin);

param.name: offset
param.span: 相對於原始參數的位元組位移。

span.span: A byte offset that is relative to the origin parameter.

param.name: origin
param.span: 指示用以取得新位置參考點之 型別的值。

span.span: A value of type that indicates the reference point that is used to obtain the new position.

summary.span: 設定資料流中的讀取/寫入位置。

span.span: Sets the read/write position within the stream.
An that represents the new read/write position.

Public Overrides Sub SetLength (value As Long)
public: override void SetLength(long value);

param.name: value

span.span: The needed length, in bytes, of the current stream.

summary.span: 設定資料流的長度。

span.span: Sets the length of the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料流必須支援寫入和搜尋的運作。A stream must support both writing and seeking for to work. 使用屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援寫入，並使用屬性來判斷是否支援搜尋。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing, and use the property to determine whether seeking is supported.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Write (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Write (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer)
public: override void Write(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要從中複製資料流的位元組陣列。

span.span: An array of bytes from which to copy to the stream.

param.name: offset
param.span: buffer 中以零為起始的位元組位移，即開始將位元組複製到資料流的位置。

span.span: The zero-based byte offset in the buffer where you want to begin copying bytes to the stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 要寫入資料流的位元組數目。

span.span: The number of bytes to write to the stream.

summary.span: 將位元組序列寫入資料流，並依寫入的位元組數將資料流中的讀取/寫入位置往前移。

span.span: Writes a sequence of bytes to the stream and advances the read/write position in the stream by the number of bytes that are written.
